name: RemoteSeniorCare
0:
”Alexa open remote senior care”
”Can my loved one call for help?”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: remote senior care
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Remote Senior Care is a service helping folks care for their parents and elders through helpful setup & friendly support of technology like Alexa. This skill helps solve some basic issues using this suite of technology. 

About Remote Senior Care: Remote Senior Care, (AKA RSC) preserves your loved one’s independence while keeping them safe, stimulated and happy using the latest sophisticated yet easy to use technology,. Your loved one doesn’t need to have any technical abilities. We help you take control with the assistance of the RSC Team. Your loved one has simple voice commands for reaching you to share a daily update or reaching help whenever needed, 24/7.

Founded by a Disney veteran & a technology thought leader, after creating a one of a kind suite of technology to keep their own parents cared for, stimulated and happy, they thought this was something they needed to share with the world, and help other families struggling with the challenges of caring for their aging parents while living their busy lives, and in many cases still taking care of their kids. Helping with the classic sandwich generation challenges through innovative technology, and Disney level customer service is at the heart of everything RSC stands for.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
